A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many are trying to say only a few fans are tanking this film.  Well\, as I write this\, 177\,469 others have left a review.  What does that mean?  THIS MOVIE SUCKED!!!  Honestly\, why are people still defending this?  The \"leaders\" of the Star Wars Nazi party are all screeching snowflake millennials\, yelling and having temper tantrums?  And THIS is supposed to be the replacement for the Empire and Darth Vader?!?  All you need to beat the First Order is a stern adult.  This was an insult to the saga George Lucas created.
